channel.title: 2H stance
channel.description:
Hey, so i have the real 2H stance of god swords wielding & walking but the normal attack & running isn't that great, is there any way of improving it, i have seen some servers & its way better and mine isn't as good and id like to improve it.
if anyone could help it would be much appreciated. - lewis.

item.title: 2H stance
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:2, topic:311900”][quote author=Lewis) link=topic=408344.msg3014369#msg3014369 date=1257083709]
Hey, so i have the real 2H stance of god swords wielding, walking & running but the normal attack isn’t that great, is there any way of improving it, i have seen some servers & its way better and mine isn’t as good and id like to improve it.

if anyone could help it would be much appreciated.

  • lewis.
    [/quote]

Fiddle around with emote/anim IDs.

Or you could always try animating one yourself. It’s somewhat fun to do, if you have the time.

I’ve tried making a 2h blocking emote that would’ve been epic, if I weren’t so fail at making emotes.[/quote]

I wouldn’t know where to start, what files is the animations in & emotes and what do you search to find them?

Read full topic

item.title: 2H stance
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“Lewis), post:1, topic:311900”]Hey, so i have the real 2H stance of god swords wielding, walking & running but the normal attack isn’t that great, is there any way of improving it, i have seen some servers & its way better and mine isn’t as good and id like to improve it.

if anyone could help it would be much appreciated.

  • lewis.[/quote]

Fiddle around with emote/anim IDs.

Or you could always try animating one yourself. It’s somewhat fun to do, if you have the time.

I’ve tried making a 2h blocking emote that would’ve been epic, if I weren’t so fail at making emotes.

Read full topic
